detaileddescription.para: Target ambient illuminance in the On state. - Unit: Lux - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 0.01 lx) - Range: 0 to 167772.13
Target ambient illuminance in the Prolong state. - Unit: Lux - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 0.01 lx) - Range: 0 to 167772.13
Target ambient illuminance in the Standby state. - Unit: Lux - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 0.01 lx) - Range: 0 to 167772.13
Lightness in the On state. - Unit: Unitless - Encoding: 16 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1) - Range: 0 to 65535
Lightness in the Prolong state. - Unit: Unitless - Encoding: 16 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1) - Range: 0 to 65535
Lightness in the Standby state. - Unit: Unitless - Encoding: 16 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1) - Range: 0 to 65535
Regulator Accuracy. - Unit: Percent - Encoding: 8 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 0.5 %) - Range: 0 to 100.0
Fade time for fading to the Prolong state. - Unit: Seconds - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1 ms) - Range: 0 to 16777.214
Fade time for fading to the On state. - Unit: Seconds - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1 ms) - Range: 0 to 16777.214
Fade time for fading to the Standby state (auto mode). - Unit: Seconds - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1 ms) - Range: 0 to 16777.214
Fade time for fading to the Standby state (manual mode). - Unit: Seconds - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1 ms) - Range: 0 to 16777.214
Delay from Occupancy sensor reports until the light turns on. - Unit: Seconds - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1 ms) - Range: 0 to 16777.214
Time to stay in the Prolong state. * - Unit: Seconds - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1 ms) - Range: 0 to 16777.214
Time to stay in the On state. - Unit: Seconds - Encoding: 24 bit unsigned scalar (Resolution: 1 ms) - Range: 0 to 16777.214
Light Lightness Control properties
Regulator downwards integral coeffient (Kid). - Unit: Unitless - Encoding: 32 bit floating point. - Range: 0 to 1000.0
Regulator upwards integral coeffient (Kiu). - Unit: Unitless - Encoding: 32 bit floating point. - Range: 0 to 1000.0
Regulator downwards proportional coeffient (Kpd). - Unit: Unitless - Encoding: 32 bit floating point. - Range: 0 to 1000.0
Regulator upwards proportional coeffient (Kpu). - Unit: Unitless - Encoding: 32 bit floating point. - Range: 0 to 1000.0
Light Control Regulator Coefficients
